website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive yet solid wetsuit that offer protection and perks for a wide range of water sports.
pros: Reinforced knees give you more padding for surfing and paddle boarding
Nice no-logo look at a great price
cons: Runs a little small, so consider ordering up a size
Some complaints of fit around ankles and wrists being too loose

customer_reviews.title: I am 5’6” 170 lbs and this xl is perfect! No loss of circulation at the ankles and ...
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’6” 170 lbs and this xl is perfect! No loss of circulation at the ankles and wrists. I like that it has no branding and it’s also very warm.
customer_reviews.author: Shell Don Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and warm but not too warm
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this suit! I am a 5 ft 2 inch petite woman with a slim to average build (size 0-2 in women's clothing) and I bought a size small. The suit fit me well but also kept me warm in the ocean as we snorkeled. I tend to get cold easily so I was very happy to be able to snorkel for a long time without feeling cold. It also protected me from the jellyfish (o stings) as my oldest daughter who opted to skip out on her wetsuit the first day of snorkeling ended up with 12 stings and chilled. Highly recommend this suit!
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Fit is good, more to come.
customer_reviews.text: This it the 1 wetsuit we've ever bought so I can only speak to the size as we aren't pro divers or anything and don't know quite what to look for in quality and whatnot, but I will update this as they get their use. My wife is about 5'4" and 155lbs. She's got a nice thick "transom" and beautiful huge "bouys". Average build with all the right accessories. ;) We got her a Large and it fits perfectly. Update: I originally gave this 3 stars because of our ignorance to Wetsuits, in general. However after she used it this last weekend in 64 degree water she want it to have 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Topher

customer_reviews.title: Great wet suit!
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit long but fits great! Just had to fold in the sleeves and legs in. Went swimming in the springs which the water is normally a nice cold 72 degrees year round and it kept me nice and warm in the water. Also used it to go tubing 4 hrs down the springs rivers and protected me from getting sun burned where I was covered.
customer_reviews.author: Giselle M.

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Wetsuit fit well and performed well in the cold waters of the Galapagos Islands. It sealed well around the neck, wrists and ankles. At only 3mm thick my wife decided to wear a shorty (provided by the cruiseline) on top of the full wetsuit. (see picture) That really worked well as she really hates being cold.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: 144lbs this fits nicely except the crotch area goes a bit longer than ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'8", 144lbs this fits nicely except the crotch area goes a bit longer than where it should be. I'm using this for paddeboarding in the winter time. I'm not really in the water but just in case I fall in. I'm using this in Washington/Oregon. I highly suggest buying gloves and the booties as well. I didn't have gloves and couldn't feel my hands and paddle.
customer_reviews.author: Yessica

customer_reviews.title: I recommend a downsize
customer_reviews.text: I'm honestly surprised by the quality of this product, given how cheap the wetsuit was. One thing I wish I had known would be to order a smaller size. I couldn't tell that it would be loose because it was super tight to begin with, and I had a lot of difficulty putting the wetsuit on. However, once I got in the water, the suit began to expand, and I got a lot of cold water running through my body for the next four hours of surfing. Not fun at all. I recommend to size down. Also, make sure you return it if it fits comfortably while you're dry.
customer_reviews.author: IvyTomarra

customer_reviews.title: This wetsuit is so great! I have had more expensive brand name wetsuits ...
customer_reviews.text: This wetsuit is so great! I have had more expensive brand name wetsuits in the past, this is by far more comfortable. I am 5’2” and weigh 115, slight to athletic type build. This suit is perfect, not too tight, not too loose. Reinforced knees that were an unexpected bonus for paddle boarding and surfing. Easy on, easy off and the neck, arm, leg openings are great....not too tight or too loose. Awesome purchase for the price!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lori P.

customer_reviews.title: Looks pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'3, and weigh 120 pounds. The suit fits great. The only thing I would criticize on it, is the armpit area. Fabric does a little bit of a bunching thing there. But it doesn't look too bad as you can see in the pictures. I haven't swam in it yet, but I'm excited to! I'm hoping it will keep me warmer than my Shorty wetsuit that I've used for years.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Great for getting into unheated pool while all the gyms are closed. It is just what I wanted, super cute! Only down-side: it smells like a tire shop! But probably pretty typical. I washed it and hung it to dry outside and that helped mellow it out.
customer_reviews.author: It'sSunnyOverHere

customer_reviews.title: S size perfect for petite women
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'1 and 34-26-36. I got an S size and it fits snugly. If you are a few inches taller or have body measurements with 1~2inches difference from mine, it would be ok too since it's stretchable. I use it for wakeboarding and the underarms area have extra space/fabric so 360degrees movement is well supported. Definitely a great buy! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann

customer_reviews.title: I love this wetsuit!
customer_reviews.text: Great wetsuit, especially for the price. I'm tall and weigh about 136 pounds. Even though all the advice from other buyers said to get the Medium, that one was a skimpy fit, just too tight. The size Large is just right, easy to move in while fitting me pretty closely all over. Have stayed in the water 2 hours and not gotten chilly. Compared with my other 2mm wetsuits, this one feels a little thinner, a little more lightweight. Nice color, like raspberry sherbet.
customer_reviews.author: MaryWho

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: Its a pretty good fit given how pear shaped I am. It does gap a little in the armpit area, but I feel like if I had boobs that wouldn't be an issue. Only reason for the 4 star was when I walk it makes a pretty decent scratching noise and I am worried once I use it at the springs the material might not ACTUALLY be the best quality. However I did pay half the price for this compared to ones in the store so I really cant complain that much.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: It fits!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'1" and 105 lbs. Got size S. Fits very well from ankles up to the waist, although a little loose around shoulders and arms. Not a problem, as I only plan to use it to extend the swimming season in my backyard inground pool with no heating! Does keep me warmer in the water, and it's pretty easy to put on / take off. Looks nice too! Overall happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Painter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased turquoise medium for my daughter (17 yr old daughter whose 5'6"). She is a slim build just like girl pictured....Suit fit like a glove...tight enough but not choking and has enough room to grow into as well... Color was perfect just as pictured. Very pleased with the result. Daughter loves it...good for both Boogie board and surfing. Lissa - San Diego
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Best wet suit yet
customer_reviews.text: I am a swim instructor in Cali and it can get cold when your in the water all day long! I splurged for an O’Neil and it does not compare to this suit! It kept my warm, even in the coldest pools! Not to mention the price is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Michael Boord

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This wetsuit worked very well on a recent 3 week trip to Hawaii. I chill easily in water and wearing this wetsuit allowed me to extend my snorkeling adventures considerably. All wetsuits are difficult to put on but this one being only 3mm/2mm was much easier. It is stylish too with the aqua sleeves and very slimming.For the money, buy it! You won't be sorry. I am 5'7" and weigh 135 pounds and size large fit well. Sleeves are a bit too long though.
customer_reviews.author: sandy foulkes

customer_reviews.title: Great wet suit
customer_reviews.text: Great wet suit! Love that it is all black with a few nice details. The back zipper is great and extremely easy to use. I’m 5 ft 4 weigh 133 and got a size medium and fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Cornell

customer_reviews.title: Nice Suit!
customer_reviews.text: Quality, form, fit, function, price are great! Wife: 50+, 5’ @ 100#, 32/29/34, inseam 23, arm 16, size 14 youth / size 4 woman Legs a little long, but very comfortable all around. Not too tight and not too loose.
customer_reviews.author: Sean A. Curran

customer_reviews.title: it fits me!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if a small would be right for me - i'm only 5'5" but I'm long-waisted. It's a great fit and although it's the first wetsuit I've ever worn, it seems to be doing the job! As our pool temp drops, I'm still able to swim my laps. I don't think that will be possible if the water temp gets into the low 70's (I'm a cold temp wimp) but for now, it's working! (my ideal water temp is 90 degrees and up!
customer_reviews.author: Lori T

customer_reviews.title: The wet suit looks stylish!
customer_reviews.text: I love my wet suit! It has made the pool temp. Good! It has saved me lot’s of time. You see, I have dementia, and it has allowed me to swim In my pool in April! ( while my husband rides his bike). I can reach the bottom-and otherwise it’s Too cold. I’m 73, it makes me feel independent, with all the social distancing!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Could of got a bigger size
customer_reviews.text: It's feels amazing, it's thick. I can't wait to get it wet. It came yesterday, ordered two days ago I believe. Im 5'8 some where between 145 and 155lbs, big gap but i don't keep track all that well. The suit i got is a little um... snug. I got a small, despite review suggestions. If you're about my size a small will fit but it'll be really tight. Im more legs and arms, than body lol. And I'm pretty flat in places. Like a young jennifer garner lol.
customer_reviews.author: Leila

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and back zipper works well
customer_reviews.text: 5’ 109lbs and I ordered a small and it fit, snug but still some room for more pounds for those whose a little heavier, surprise with the good quality since it’s very inexpensive, ordered one each also for my husband, son and his girlfriend. Will be using it mostly for snorkeling and maybe paddle boarding during cold weather. This brand doesn’t come in extra small...so I will be ordering a different brand just in case it is too loose when using for snorkeling, but either way I will use it for kayaking or paddle boarding because it fits comfortably and not very tight and constricting.
customer_reviews.author: JULIE C. Reno, NV

customer_reviews.title: great wetsuit especially for price
customer_reviews.text: fits true to size and is comfortable. also works in cold water, keep in mind it’s a WETSUIT not a dry suit. so water is going to get into your suit but it’ll keep it in and your body will warm it up.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Tight neck and my neck isn’t big
customer_reviews.text: Fits ok...the legs and arms are loose but the body is the right size. The neck though!! I don’t have a big neck but holy crap is the neck uncomfortable if zipped and velcroed shut.
customer_reviews.author: S. spronsen

customer_reviews.title: Warm but not comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This product is made me warm for a swim in a cold lake. But, it was a nightmare to wear. It’s not stretchy and it is not comfortable. It was okay when I was wearing it. But not when I wore it and after I wore it. It’s just very difficult to wear, I honestly think it needs to be more stretchy.
customer_reviews.author: Jaja Balderama

customer_reviews.title: The products were good and well made
customer_reviews.text: The products were good and well made, but the sizing is off. just too small compared to standard sizes. suggest ordering at least one size larger than what you might need.
customer_reviews.author: Beau

customer_reviews.title: Life changing!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never used a wetsuit before, and holy cow this is life changing. I live on the Great Lakes, so the water never gets too warm. The water temperature was 64 degrees today, and this wetsuit kept me warm while swimming in it. It’s a little tight on the neck, but otherwise comfortable and fits me very well.
customer_reviews.author: mbgtc67

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and warm!
customer_reviews.text: I have been surfing for over 18 years now. Billabong, Roxy, o’Neill Wetsuits for women were only a fit when I was younger, not broad in the shoulders etc. Realon has a size chart and it fit right away. Warmer than my spring suit but much more elastic and stretchy. Love it! I have the short and the long.
customer_reviews.author: Natty

customer_reviews.title: 120 lb and the medium fits me perfect except for a little bulge in the belly area
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5"3', 120 lb and the medium fits me perfect except for a little bulge in the belly area. I haven't swam in cold water and really don't plan to, but it definitely protects me from "scary" things in the water. It's not waterproof, but I didn't expect it to be. Great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Patti Cake

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap option for a wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: Bought these wetsuits for my kids. We just needed something in the late spring for the kids to wear while kayaking while the water was still cold, just in case they fell in. These worked great. My kids are in middle school and they liked them.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal V

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great wet suit!!! Best material used , overall I'm happy with my purchase and the shipping was fast either.
customer_reviews.author: QueenVee

customer_reviews.title: Works well and has extended the Michigan water ski season
customer_reviews.text: There's no way I would have been in the water today without this. Very happy with the fit and warmth and would definitely recommend. I'm 5'6" 115 lbs and the medium fits very well.
customer_reviews.author: RW_MI

customer_reviews.title: Definitely what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I got some grief when I took this to a triathlon as I was told by "veterans" that this was not considered a full wet suit, however, I was in roughly 50-60 degree (F) water, and was warm. This has been the perfect suit for me, and I will continue to use it in future triathlons.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Pickard

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: Totally saved my snorkeling. I’m a big baby when it comes to cold water and this wetsuit kept me warm and comfy! I admit the water wasn’t that cold, but I wasn’t cold at all! Loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Pet817

customer_reviews.title: Staying Warm
customer_reviews.text: Bought this suit for working out in the water. It was amazing at keeping me warm while exercising in the water for an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Affie Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great and durable
customer_reviews.text: Great product , bought it for the cold pacific water for my wife and she’s happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Farley

customer_reviews.title: Warm!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 1st wetsuit. Purchased it for a white water rafting trip during a cold front. Love the fit and will definitely be wearing it again!!!! I purchased a medium. I'm 5' 7", 137lb. Would recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Candice C

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit in small for my 12 year old daughter. She is 5’3” 112lbs. Quality materials. No overwhelming smell. Cute styling. Has an oval bib that some may or may not prefer
customer_reviews.author: Quality Seeker

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly the same quality as a name brand suit costing 4 times as much. Great buy! I used it to brave the winter water on a trip to Key West and to avoid jellyfish stings. Worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, flattering on!
customer_reviews.text: This wetsuit is exactly what I needed! I traveled with it to Belize and Mexico to use for diving to about 60ft. It’s the perfect thickness to keep me warm. It is great quality and is flattering. The sleeves are a beautiful teal color. All around very impressed by how nice this wetsuit is! I am 6ft tall, 147lbs and a size large fits pretty well. There is a little room in the chest area but I’m a slim person.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Weisenhorn

customer_reviews.title: Nice suit, been swimming in 68 degree and I'm fine.
customer_reviews.text: Just haven't gotten taking it off down, a wet wet suit is not easy to get off, a struggle, I still need help. Any info appreciated
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for SUPing in cold water
customer_reviews.text: I got the medium. I’m 5’4” and 130 pounds. It fits great! It kept me warm when I wiped out in the Pacific Ocean in December. Great for SUPing. See the pics.
customer_reviews.author: Jody J. Wissing

customer_reviews.title: Fits Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I ordered and returned two wetsuits until I received this one. It fits perfect. I was super happy when I tried it on. I'm leaving for my cruise soon then I'll have the chance to wear it while snorkeling.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Good looking wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: This wetsuit fits well and is attractive. The fit could be a little more tailored but given the price this was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J. G.

customer_reviews.title: I am 5'4" and 127 lbs. the fit in ...
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'4" and 127 lbs. the fit in the body was okay but the fit around the feet and wrists was too loose. I bought this suit as a scuba diving suit but it is NOT a scuba suit but a board suit. I returned it as a Prime customer and was still charged $6.42 to return. Stitching was zig zag around the zipper, feet and wrists.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea S

customer_reviews.title: Good value wetsuit.
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Did it's job great in the cold water of the pacific ocean in the Galapagos in November. Take one size larger.
customer_reviews.author: joyce

customer_reviews.title: Right on time
customer_reviews.text: Received right on time for my birthday jet skiing adventure. I’m tall, 5’9 and bought the large. Could have probably used the medium as the chest area is baggy but overall it fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Shayla

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for my water exercise class. Easy on and off. I sized up one size perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great wet suit for price
customer_reviews.text: This is a stretchy suit fit great! I use it for snorkeling in CA 58-65 degree water and it keeps me warm.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Smith

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'5", 120lb and I ordered a small. At first I was hesitant because the suit was not tight around my arms and armpits. I was worried that those gaps would keep me cold. But I tried it out an it works great!!! It's a bit too tight around my knees, but I forgot about it almost immediately as soon as I started swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Neely G.

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and feels warm
customer_reviews.text: Good and fits well. Medium 5’8 150 lbs would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Brianna M

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases I've ever made
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I've ever made. I was nervous to order something like this online without trying it on and at a budget price but it's good quality that fits me perfectly! Wore it for an 8 hour OCR event and had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Sizing accurate. Price good.
customer_reviews.text: Good value for price. The sizing chart was on point and accurate. I'm only planning on using seasonally during the winter if you need something year round I would consider a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kel

customer_reviews.title: Quality wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality and fits as expected definitely should buy you won’t be sorry you did.
customer_reviews.author: capesky08

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the two I kept from an order of 5 wetsuits. Good sizing
customer_reviews.author: morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great quality
customer_reviews.text: Such a great value. I didn’t expect this quality from a $50 wetsuit. I’m using it this weekend for a triathlon, and was pleasantly surprised when it came in the mail. Most loved feature- no obnoxious branding. I ordered XL, I’m 5’9 and 165 lbs, athletic build.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Fowler

customer_reviews.title: It did not add up to reviews.
customer_reviews.text: It was difficult to put on, the zipper worked, I wasn't prepared for water flowing in through it. It was not comfortable and restricted my movement.
customer_reviews.author: Janet K. Herbin

customer_reviews.title: It’s true to size and keeps me very warm.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this wet suit. I’m a swim instructor and it can get pretty cold at night so having this wet suit really helped me stay warm.
customer_reviews.author: cinthia salcedo

customer_reviews.title: Great wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: Bought to go swimming with dolphins 🐬 fit well reasonable price
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine, but it did fit a little funny
customer_reviews.text: I used it to go in the ocean at California during early May, so it didn’t need to be super warm. It worked great for that water though. My one issue was just that the sleeve lengths were super short and it was a little baggy around the shoulder and armpit area. It still worked fine though!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Farley

customer_reviews.title: Good thick material.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice thick material! Didn’t get to wear it in the water yet. Stay tuned!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Size down
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good quality wetsuit but the sizing is a bit off. I am 5’10 148 pounds measurements 91-66-99 which would make me closest to a size large. The size large was super baggy in the arms chest and waist. Definitely size down if you are between sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not need the money. I just want to exchange this product for either different style or size
customer_reviews.text: Too small around the neck. I need to exchange this product for some different style. Please send me a returning slip to send it back. The returning window is closed. I DO NOT NEED THE MONEY BACK THANK YOU
customer_reviews.author: Aurea Hendrycks

customer_reviews.title: Water wear
customer_reviews.text: Struggle to get on, but it fit and I look forward to using it soon.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Boone

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: Fit well. Kept me fairly warm although I do run cold and got cold in the water after awhile. Used it in the spring in Southern California where water is high fifties low sixties.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Threads started coming loose the first time I wore it. Comfortable fit. Just not durable.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Jai Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 5’4 and I weight about 120lb and I bought the Small size. It fits me perfectly and it’s easy to put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Rafaela S.

customer_reviews.title: Wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: The fit is just right. I ordered one size larger than I normally wear. We haven't used them yet, but plan to next week on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Loved this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I went tubing down the river and it worked perfect! The size was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: debra quent

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. I purchased it a size larger and it was awesome. It kept me warm. Easy to get in and out of wet or dry.
customer_reviews.author: Deshan Ross

customer_reviews.title: i like it. 1) no logo and clean 2) seems ...
customer_reviews.text: i like it. 1) no logo and clean 2) seems pretty durable so far. 3) works - im warm! 4) and front panel is great for surfing doesnt pick up all the wax residue
customer_reviews.author: T Brock

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it. It is cheaply made and very thin
customer_reviews.author: Federico Ramos Puente

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: Quite good for the price and the measurement chart provided is very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Eximo

customer_reviews.title: The size is perfect and is fairly comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am currently training for my 1st sprint triathlon & since the water will still be fairly cold, I figured I should invest in a wet suit. The size is perfect and is fairly comfortable. The only complaint I would have is the back velcro flap at the very top. Even when I have my swimming cap on, my long baby hairs fall out & then get tangled into the velcro flap. Not this company's fault; just the struggles of being a girl with long hair-lol!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: There are little holes in the front which made me confused ...?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits great with no bunching!
customer_reviews.text: This thing fits great. I haven't taken it out on Lake Erie yet, so that will be the real test. Im 5.5 inches, 145 lbs and 36D chest, short torso. It fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: R. Aponte

product_meta.title: Realon Womens Wetsuit Full 3mm 2mm Neoprene Surfing Scuba Diving Snorkeling Swimming Suit
feature_bullets: Womens wetsuit full body style for surfing, snorkeling, scuba diving, swimming and boarding etc
Premium neoprene wet suit long sleeves for women and girls to keep warmth in cold water
2mm surf suit 3mm dive suit with stretchy panels comfortable enough for all day wear
Durable overall flatlock stitching swimwear provide compression & athletic fit
Anti-abrasive reinforced kneepads, durable heavy duty 10V YKK back zip with long leash
